description: Overview of the InvalidSignerTypeError method
slug: wallets/reference/aa-sdk/core/classes/InvalidSignerTypeError/constructor
---

Constructs an error message when an invalid signer type is passed to SmartAccountSigner.

<Note>
  `InvalidSignerTypeError` extends `BaseError`, see the docs for BaseError for
  all supported methods.
</Note>

## Import

```ts
import { InvalidSignerTypeError } from "@aa-sdk/core";
```

## Parameters

### signerType

`string`
An optional parameter specifying the signer type. If not provided, a default error message will be used.
